structure.unit: ARTICLE X. DOWNTOWN KENDALL SYSTEM BETTERMENT

text.section:
Sec. 32-201. Agreement.
This Board finds that it is in the best interest of Miami-Dade County to waive competitive bidding procedures and the provisions of Administrative Order 3-2 and hereby authorizes the Miami-Dade Water and Sewer Department (Department), to enter into an agreement with Downtown Dadeland Residential Condominiums, LLC, to install new water and sewer lines in North Kendall Drive; formal bidding being waived by two-thirds () vote of the Board, pursuant to Section 255.20(1)(a)(10) of the Florida Statutes and Section 4.03(D) of the Home Rule Charter.
